text_description: {pitcher} LOSES CONTROL AND PLUNKS {batter}—HE'LL TAKE FIRST BASE.
OUCH! {batter} GETS HIT BY THE PITCH AND TROTS TO FIRST.
{batter} TAKES ONE FOR THE TEAM AND HEADS TO FIRST BASE.
A WAYWARD PITCH FROM {pitcher} HITS {batter}—FREE PASS TO FIRST.
THAT ONE GOT AWAY FROM {pitcher}! {batter} IS AWARDED FIRST BASE.
{batter} WEARS IT! HIT BY PITCH AND DOWN TO FIRST HE GOES.
A PAINFUL WAY TO REACH BASE—{batter} GETS DRILLED AND TAKES FIRST.
INSIDE FASTBALL CATCHES {batter}—HIT BY PITCH, HE'LL TAKE HIS BASE.
{batter} GETS DUSTED OFF—AND NOW HE'S AWARDED FIRST BASE.
HBP! {batter} SHAKES IT OFF AND TAKES THE FREE PASS.
{batter} IS HIT BY THE PITCH! RUNNERS NOW ON FIRST AND SECOND.
OUCH! {batter} TAKES ONE, PUSHING THE RUNNER TO SECOND BASE.
{pitcher} HITS {batter}—RUNNER ADVANCES, AND TROUBLE BREWS.
ANOTHER MISTAKE FROM {pitcher}—HBP! TWO ON NOW.
{batter} GRIMACES AS HE TAKES FIRST—RUNNER MOVES TO SECOND.
{pitcher} BEANS {batter}! FIRST AND SECOND NOW OCCUPIED.
HIT BY PITCH! {batter} HEADS TO FIRST, RUNNER MOVES UP.
A DANGEROUS MISTAKE FROM {pitcher}! {batter} TROTS TO FIRST.
HBP! {batter} GETS CLIPPED, AND THE BASE PATHS SHIFT.
THAT ONE STUNG! {batter} TAKES HIS BASE, RUNNER UP TO SECOND.
{batter} GETS HIT! NOW THERE ARE TWO ON, A SCORING THREAT.
INSIDE PITCH CATCHES {batter}! FIRST AND SECOND NOW.
HIT BATTER! {pitcher} LOSES CONTROL, AND {batter} TAKES HIS BASE.
A ROUGH MISTAKE FROM {pitcher}! {batter} ADVANCES, TWO ON NOW.
OUCH! {batter} GETS BEANED—NOW RUNNERS ON FIRST AND SECOND.
{batter} TAKES THE HIT! A BIG CHANCE NOW WITH TWO ON.
HBP! {batter} TAKES FIRST, AND NOW THE PRESSURE BUILDS.
{pitcher} LOSES GRIP, AND {batter} GETS AWARDED FIRST.
{batter} GETS DRILLED—PITCHER LOOKS FRUSTRATED!
HBP! {batter} WALKS IT OFF AND HEADS TO FIRST.
{batter} IS HIT! FIRST AND THIRD SITUATION NOW.
OUCH! {pitcher} PLUNKS {batter}, SETTING UP A BIG OPPORTUNITY.
HIT BY PITCH! {batter} TAKES FIRST, LEAVING RUNNERS AT THE CORNERS.
{batter} TAKES ONE OFF THE ARM—NOW TWO ON.
FIRST AND THIRD AFTER THAT HBP—PITCHER IN TROUBLE!
{pitcher} MISSES HIS SPOT, AND {batter} TAKES FIRST.
A DANGEROUS MISTAKE FROM {pitcher}! RUNNERS AT THE CORNERS.
{batter} GETS HIT! FIRST AND THIRD, A BIG CHANCE COMING UP.
HBP! {batter} HEADS TO FIRST, BUT THE LEAD RUNNER STAYS PUT.
{batter} SHAKES IT OFF—HE'S NOW ON FIRST, RUNNERS AT THE CORNERS!
HIT BY PITCH! {batter} LOADS THE BASES.
OUCH! {pitcher} HITS {batter}, AND NOW THE BASES ARE FULL.
A COSTLY HBP! {batter} HEADS TO FIRST, BASES LOADED!
ANOTHER BEANBALL FROM {pitcher}! {batter} TAKES HIS BASE, BASES NOW FULL.
{batter} GETS DRILLED—THE BASES ARE JUICED!
THAT ONE GOT AWAY! {batter} WALKS TO FIRST, BASES LOADED.
HBP! {batter} TROTS TO FIRST, CREATING A BIG OPPORTUNITY.
{pitcher} LOSES COMMAND—{batter} GETS HIT, FILLING THE BASES.
HIT BATTER! BASES NOW LOADED AS {batter} TAKES HIS BASE.
OUCH! {batter} TAKES ONE, AND NOW THE BASES ARE CLOGGED.
{batter} IS HIT! NOW TWO ON, FIRST AND SECOND.
A BRUTAL HBP! {batter} TAKES FIRST, AND THE PRESSURE BUILDS.
{pitcher} DRILLS {batter}! FIRST AND SECOND SITUATION NOW.
OUCH! {batter} WALKS TO FIRST, AND A BIG CHANCE LOOMS.
{batter} GETS BEANED! TWO ON NOW.
ANOTHER FREE PASS—BUT A PAINFUL ONE! {batter} HEADS TO FIRST.
{pitcher} PLUNKS {batter}, AND THE OFFENSE IS THREATENING.
HBP! {batter} TAKES HIS BASE, LEAVING TWO ON.
{batter} SHAKES IT OFF—NOW TWO ON FOR THE NEXT BATTER.
DANGEROUS SITUATION! {batter} HEADS TO FIRST, FIRST AND SECOND OCCUPIED.
OUCH! {batter} GETS HIT—BASES NOW LOADED!
{pitcher} LOSES CONTROL AGAIN—{batter} TAKES HIS BASE, BASES FULL!
HIT BY PITCH! {batter} WALKS IT OFF, BASES JUICED.
{batter} SHAKES IT OFF—NOW THE BASES ARE LOADED.
A TOUGH BREAK FOR {pitcher}—HBP, AND THE BASES ARE FULL.
HIT BATTER! THE BASES ARE LOADED, TROUBLE FOR THE DEFENSE.
OUCH! {batter} TAKES HIS BASE, EVERY BAG IS FILLED NOW.
HBP! {batter} HEADS TO FIRST, THE BASES ARE FULL.
A WILD ONE FROM {pitcher}! {batter} GETS HIT, BASES LOADED.
{batter} ABSORBS THE HIT—A BRUTAL WAY TO LOAD THE BASES!
HIT BY PITCH! {batter} TAKES FIRST, AND A RUN SCORES!
OUCH! {batter} IS BEANED, AND THE RUN COMES HOME!
PAINFUL RBI FOR {batter}! HE TAKES FIRST AS A RUN SCORES.
ANOTHER BASE RUNNER—AND ANOTHER RUN IN! HBP FOR {batter}.
{pitcher} PLUNKS {batter}, FORCING A RUN ACROSS!
TOO FAR INSIDE! {batter} TAKES HIS BASE, AND A RUN SCORES.
A FREE PASS—BUT A PAINFUL ONE! {batter} FORCES A RUN HOME.
HBP! {batter} WALKS TO FIRST AS THE RUNNER SCORES.
A PAINFUL RBI FOR {batter}! BASES STILL LOADED.
HIT BY PITCH! {batter} TAKES HIS BASE, AND THE SCORE TIGHTENS!
